import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-list', templateUrl: './nav-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-list.component.css'] }) export class NavListComponent { @Input() pag : { offset: number, limit: number, current: number, total: number } = {offset:0,limit:20,current:0,total:0}; public totalPages() : number[]{ return [...Array(this.pag.total).keys()] } }
